text:
dEvA# vasavyAq agnE# sOma sUrya || 
dEvA$H SarmaNyAq mitrA#varuNA&ryamann || 
dEvA$H sapItaqyO &pA$n-napAdASuhEmann | 
uqdnO da#ttOdaqdhiM Bi#ntta diqvaH paqrjanyA#daqntari#kShAt-pRuthiqvyAstatO# 
nOq vRuShTyA#&vata || 
divA# ciqttama#H kRuNvanti paqrjanyE#nO-davAqhEna# | 
pRuqthiqvIM ~Myad vyuqndanti# ||
Ayan nara#H suqdAna#vO dadAqSuShE# diqvaH kOSaqmacu#cyavuH | 
vi paqrjanyA$H sRujantiq rOda#sIq anuq dhanva#nA yanti - [  ]  21
